pages.text: Ever wanted to sit down on a comfortable cushion instead of the cold, hard, floor? Craft a seat to do just that.$(br)Seats can be dyed just like wool.

Creatures can be attached to seats by first right-clicking a creature with a Lead and then right-clicking the seat.$(br2)Additionally, seats can be used to sit on $(l:kinetic_machines/contraptions)Contraptions$() or $(l:transportation/trains)Trains$() while they move.
